column2: This immaculate statue of The Buddha, Shakyamuni, stands poised upon a lotus before you.
Statue of the Buddha of Compassion
This immaculate statue of the Buddha of Compassion, Quan Am, stands poised upon a lotus before you.
This Worn Cauldron is used to scent the air with lavender.
The Grand Central Keep that rises above all others in the Castle Complex, standing upon a foundation of dry stone.
A Cherry Blossom Grove is present providing a beautiful sakura display every spring.
